term.title: acyl halides

item.text: Compounds consisting of an acyl group bonded to halogen, e.g. CH3S(=O)2Cl , methanesulfonyl chloride; CH3COCl , acetyl chloride; cyclohexanecarboximidoyl chloride, [image: Not defined]
